SEARCH
Package src.music

Interface SongManagement

All Known Implementing Classes:
MusicLibrary
public interface SongManagement
The SongManagement interface defines methods for managing songs. It provides functionality to add songs to a genre, delete songs from a genre, and add songs from a file to the music library.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addSong(String genreName, Song song)
    Adds a song to the specified genre.
    void
    addSongFromSerialization(List<Song> songs)
    Add the songs from the serializable object
    void
    addSongsFromFile(File filePath)
    Reads songs from a file and adds them to the music library.
    void
    deleteSong(String genreName, Song song)
    Deletes a song from the specified genre.

  • Method Details

    • addSong

      boolean addSong(String genreName, Song song)
      Adds a song to the specified genre.
      Parameters:
      genreName - The name of the genre to which the song will be added.
      song - The song to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the song was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • addSongsFromFile

      void addSongsFromFile(File filePath)
      Reads songs from a file and adds them to the music library.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file containing songs to be added.

    • addSongFromSerialization

      void addSongFromSerialization(List<Song> songs)
      Add the songs from the serializable object
      Parameters:
      songs -

    • deleteSong

      void deleteSong(String genreName, Song song)
      Deletes a song from the specified genre.
      Parameters:
      genreName - The name of the genre from which the song will be deleted.
      song - The song to be deleted.
